attributes.action: see that GPs & Doctors [fully qualified] monitor and sign records after written by those on remit and contract  and put on computer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Have had Surgeries and PCT s  often conveniently losing documents and not recording correct facts with omissions[ by LA employees]  .That GPs should check and sign that what is recorded on computer or letter  is correct; as often it is a  corporate, directed  PA or  admin on a remit , or Doctor on a contract .
